Smart Faucet: A faucet that uses AI technology to detect leaks and automatically shut off the water supply to prevent wastage. It also tracks the amount of water used and provides recommendations for water-saving habits.
Faucet with built-in Filter: A faucet that has a built-in filter that removes impurities and contaminants from the water supply. This ensures that the water is safe for drinking and washing dishes.
Voice-activated Faucet: A faucet that can be controlled using voice commands. Users can turn on and off the water supply, adjust the flow rate, and even set a timer for a specific amount of time.
Faucet with built-in LED Lights: A faucet that has built-in LED lights that illuminate the sink area. This is useful in low-light conditions and can also provide a relaxing ambiance.

Faucet with Built-in Water Heater: A faucet that has a built-in water heater that heats the water as it flows through the tap. This ensures that the water is always hot and ready to use, without the need for a separate water heater.
